short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scans for Web3 addresses in URLs and provides token security information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iSec Systems Web3 Token Scanner is a powerful browser extension designed to provide real-time information and analysis of Crypto tokens. It offers a comprehensive overview of token metrics, holder information, airdrops, and team wallet details, all in an easy-to-use interface.
